 BACKUPFILES=""
 OPT=""						# OPT string for use with pg_dump ( see man pg_dump )
 
+if [ "$TABLES" ]; then
+    for T in $TABLES; do
+        OPT="$OPT -t $T "
+    done
+fi
+
+if [ "$COMP_INLINE" ]; then
+    OPT="$OPT -Z $COMP_INLINE ";
+fi
+
 # Add --compress pg_dump option to $OPT
 if [ "$COMMCOMP" -gt 0 ];
